definition: male/staminate/grand/imposing/powerful/mighty/person or state having great power and influence
thick/deep or profound/kind/generous/rich or strong in flavor/to favor/to stress

sentences.english: JIEYI owns advanced equipment and powerful technical strength.
sentences.chinese: 公司擁有先進的設備裝置和雄厚的技術實力。

sentences.english: By contrast, the United States is strong in these areas.
sentences.chinese: 相形之下，美國在這些方面實力雄厚。

sentences.english: But both Apple and Google have plenty of financial muscle to prolong the fight.
sentences.chinese: 但是，蘋果和谷歌兩家公司財力雄厚，足以打消耗戰。

sentences.english: The company has more than ten patents, technical force is abundant.
sentences.chinese: 公司擁有十餘項專利，技術力量雄厚。

sentences.english: Shaanxi has powerful education of science strength, with high-quality and practical talents.
sentences.chinese: 陝西科教實力雄厚，高素質和實用型人才富集。

sentences.english: The company has great strength and abundant supply of experienced managers.
sentences.chinese: 公司實力雄厚，貨源充足，擁有經驗豐富的管理人員。

sentences.english: Fundstrength abundant, the technology is well equipped.
sentences.chinese: 資金實力雄厚，技術裝備齊全。

sentences.english: Our company is engaged in the rigging for many years, experience rich, the technical force is abundant.
sentences.chinese: 本公司從事索具多年，經驗豐厚，技術力量雄厚。

sentences.english: He says the betting rings are well-funded and have long-term plans.
sentences.chinese: 他說，賭球團夥的資金非常雄厚，有着長遠的計劃。

sentences.english: The solid technical support is the propellent of our huge development.
sentences.chinese: 雄厚的技術支持將成爲本公司的巨大發展動力。

sentences.english: Strong technical force, with the most advanced computer equipment, numerical control machine tools.

sentences.english: Our factory has strong technical force of production and new product development capability .
sentences.chinese: 本廠擁有雄厚的生產技術力量和新產品開發能力。

sentences.english: The company possesses strong technology, strict management, and advanced products, first-class quality.
sentences.chinese: 公司管理嚴格，技術雄厚，產品先進，品質一流。

sentences.english: The Company in North China are a large company has a position of relative strength.
sentences.chinese: 本公司是華北地區的一家較大的有雄厚實力的公司。

sentences.english: Some kids have parents with deep pockets. Other kids are well down the road to financial trouble.
sentences.chinese: 有些孩子的父母資金雄厚，而其他孩子面臨財政困難。

sentences.english: Beijing Double letter is a strong company.
sentences.chinese: 北京雙信中心是一家實力雄厚的中心。
